Body: I am using Samsung S2, due to my nephew attempting too many wrong patterns in my phone now it is locked and it is displaying "Too Many Patterns Attempted sign in to your Google account".I want to know if I unlock it by using Google account, will it wipe out my all the data that is in my phone memory? If so, how can I unlock the phone without losing any data from my phone memory?
Title: How to save the data when phone is locked via too many patterns attempted?

history.Text: I am using Samsung s2 ,due to my nephew attempted too many  wrong patterns in my phone now my is locked and It is displaying **Too Many Patterns Attempted sign in to your Google account**.i got to know i will do unlock it by using Google account it will wipe out my all the data that are in my phone memory .**so how to unlock the phone without loosing any data from my phone memory.**
How to save the data when phone is locked via too many patterens attempted

I am using Samsung S2, due to my nephew attempting too many wrong patterns in my phone now it is locked and it is displaying "**Too Many Patterns Attempted sign in to your Google account**".I want to know if I unlock it by using Google account, will it wipe out my all the data that is in my phone memory? If so, how can I unlock the phone without losing any data from my phone memory?
How to save the data when phone is locked via too many patterns attempted?
